data.text:
IMPORTANT UPDATE

According to the measures taken by the authorities, the requirement for passengers having a flight to Turkey to submit a PCR test with a negative result made within 72 hours prior to arrival has been changed to be valid from December 30, 2020.

According to the measures taken by the authorities, passengers that are 6 years and older are required to submit a negative PCR test result done within the last 72 hours prior to their entrance to Turkey before their flights starting from 28.12.2020.

data.text:
The day we’ve been waiting for is here! 
We're resuming flights to North Cyprus with one flight each on 17 and 18 June.✈️ The schedule is increasing from 1 July, with seats on sale now. 
Click for more information on flying requirements: https://t.co/XnObzQHpCF https://t.co/qXoMqnCTlu

We kindly remind you that you can only take one of the following items on the list. For more measures and guidelines, please watch our video https://t.co/T0fUgTAv6g #PegasusHealthyFlying https://t.co/f5Bnyc7sqq
To speed up boarding and disembarkation, and to keep aisles clear, cabin baggage will not be permitted on board. Please drop your cabin baggage at check-in. https://t.co/OH7AjzSIDw

Your health comes first! To ensure everyone’s health and safety, you need to wear a face mask at the airport and on board the aircraft at all times. Don’t forget to bring enough masks to change them every four hours. More https://t.co/T0fUgTAv6g https://t.co/TfTEf0HMhz

data.text: Your health comes first! As Pegasus Airlines, we are ready to fly with our new measures and guidelines for healthy flying. Watch the video to find out more. #PegasusHealthyFlying ✈️✈️ https://t.co/iaU0Pryj2n

The air inside the aircraft is replaced every three minutes on average. We care about your health! 
https://t.co/KyO4OMCZKe https://t.co/FGz39DNxoa

Our highest priority is the safety and wellbeing of our guests and employees.  We are taking, and will continue to take, all the necessary measures to protect the health and safety of everyone who flies with us. https://t.co/tOjQu8pyqX
https://t.co/IpbTO6Ecq9
We care about your health! All the air in the cabin is replaced every three minutes on average. https://t.co/KyO4OMUB8O https://t.co/6Y5gxDUOlr

Dear guests, additional flight is planned for 18th March 2020 departing from İstanbul Sabiha Gökçen Airport at 15.50 to London Stansted Airport. Return flight to Sabiha Gökçen will not carry any passengers. You can buy your ticket on https://t.co/6QvNbo0bG5 or Pegasus Mobile app.

data.text: Above all, we would like to express our profound sympathy and heartfelt condolences to those families and friends who have lost loved ones and extend our thoughts to them at this difficult time.

Istanbul Sabiha Gökçen Airport, there have now been three fatalities, as confirmed by official sources.
Pegasus Airlines shares in the profound sorrow of all the people affected by this tragic accident.

data.text: With over 2000 years of history, pizzerias and local bars, Naples is a city where you can do almost everything. The beautiful coast of Amalfi and the only active volcano in mainland Europe is just around the corner to visit! So #letsfly to Naples! https://t.co/Ff0NMFZYSb https://t.co/aVHuqGWgSr

How about a walk through the ruins of history? Or possibly a few day trips of walking while enjoying a nice autumn weather? Then #letsfly to Antalya to discover the ancient Lycian Way and breathe the history of the mighty Lycian civilization!https://t.co/XOlIb4hsAf https://t.co/NpmduJdTAZ

data.text:
When you go to Hamburg, don’t forget to rent a bike or take a stroll to explore Speicherstadt’s neo-gothic features and rich history. You won’t be able to take your eyes off of its red-brick buildings, copper rooftops, and impressive web of canals.
https://t.co/tI3kWaQgKY https://t.co/3RlrEllhbr

Did you know that Germany's cultural and artistic capital Berlin has over 170 museums? You may have to reach the lightspeed to see all of them!
https://t.co/mSg3O2ojlN https://t.co/h7zBms8FLv

https://t.co/49xa5h29EJ https://t.co/dQ78Vgb7QQ

https://t.co/xYmF3zrHbj https://t.co/wLjRSmXX9R
